name: botanically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to plants or the study of plants: The mansion was surrounded by a botanically lush, rolling landscape. Botanically speaking, a tomato is a fruit, but most people still call it a vegetable. Related words
botanical
botany
More examplesFewer examplesHome to many tropical plants, the rainforest is known to be one of the most botanically diverse locations in the world. Chestnuts, hazelnuts, and walnuts are actually nuts, but peanuts are botanically classified as legumes. The botanically inspired decor included floral print wallpaper and some lush ferns.
